message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align perfectly with your needs. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $12,000. This special price reflects my commitment to ensuring you receive the best possible value while also allowing me to maintain the integrity and exclusivity of our product offerings. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Kind regards, Alice
